name: PotterSpells
0:
”Alexa, ask Potter Spells to teach me a spell”
”Alexa, ask Potter Spells for a spell”
”Alexa, open Potter Spells”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: potter spells
des: Been spending to much time in Hogsmeade and haven't been practicing your wand work? Do so in style with Potter Spells! Just ask for a spell and you will be given a random spell, it's pronunciation and effects, you'll be acing your O.W.L.s in no time!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
